definition: pattra palm tree (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
sutra written on leaves of pattra palm tree
Bayes (name)/Thomas Bayes (1702-1761), English mathematician and theologian
Sanskrit on Talipot palm leaves (idiom); Buddhist scripture
pattra palm tree (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras

sentences.english: Advanced Topics, Time Permitting Bayesian Analysis, Nonparametric Methods.
sentences.chinese: 高级主题，时贝叶斯分析，非参数方法。
贝叶斯滤波十分的有用。

sentences.english: Data were analyzed with hierarchical Bayesian modeling.
sentences.chinese: 数据通过分极贝叶斯模型分析。

sentences.english: But Palm-Leaf Culture covers a lot more than that.
sentences.chinese: 不过贝叶文化所包含的内容啊远远不止这些。

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of palm-leaf scriptures?
Why do they apply a layer of soot to the carved leaves?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要在刻好的贝叶上再涂上一层锅灰呢？

sentences.english: This method directly reuses historical cases so as to improve Bayesian network modeling efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法能够复用历史案例，提高贝叶斯网建模效率。

sentences.english: Bayesian techniques built on a word model work rather well.
sentences.chinese: 贝叶斯技术建立在单词模型上，其工作良好。

sentences.english: As to Duhem's problem, Bayesianism holds a unique perspective on it.
sentences.chinese: 对于迪昂问题，贝叶斯主义有着独特的视角。

sentences.english: Bayesian reliability sequential testing method is gave out for exponential distribution.
sentences.chinese: 推导出服从指数分布的贝叶斯可靠性序贯试验方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, we investigate enhancement of naive Bayes classifier using feature weighting technique.
sentences.chinese: 该文利用特征加权技术来增强朴素贝叶斯分类器。

sentences.english: What exactly are the palm-leaf scriptures?
This thesis deduces the statistic of the hypothesis testing by Bayesian method.
sentences.chinese: 本文使用贝叶斯学派方法导出此假设检验的统计量。

sentences.english: The second step is to evaluate for BN, decide prior probability and conditional probability.
sentences.chinese: 再为贝叶斯网络赋值，确定先验概率和条件概率。

sentences.english: In this paper, Bayesian theory is applied to classification of multiband SAR images.
sentences.chinese: 将贝叶斯理论用于多波段SAR图像的分类。

sentences.english: First, dry the collected palm leaves in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 首先要把采来的贝叶晒干。

definition: volumes of classics/volumes of scriptures/ancient scrolls
sutra written on leaves of pattra palm tree
Manes (3rd century AD), Persian prophet and founder of Manichaeism
the Indian subcontinent (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)
Xuanzang (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645
